verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
so you think that he can't find you
that you've gone too far
he's the god that finds the lost
????? ninety-nine
there's no place in heaven he can't hear your cry
especially when you turn your heart
that's when he likes to draw nigh
o my child, he's there for you
just open your heart and he'll make all things new
o my child He's there for you
just open your heart and he'll make all things new

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
there's no place in heaven that's just too far away
he'll take your darkest hour
and he'll give to you a new day
o my child, he's there for you, just give him your heart and
he'll make all things new.
